author: Daniel Greene
description:
Getting a literary agent isn’t just hard—it can be soul-crushing. In this video, I open up about my and Kay's experience navigating the query trenches, the mountain of rejections we faced, and the harsh realities of traditional publishing. If you're trying to land an agent or you're stuck in the cycle of rejection, this one's for you.

I cover:
📌 How the querying process really works
📌 What literary agents are looking for
📌 Why rejection doesn’t always mean your book is bad
📌 What finally worked for me
📌 Tips for surviving the emotional toll of it all

Whether you're querying your first novel or considering giving up, I hope this video gives you insight, hope, and a dose of real talk about the publishing industry.

🔔 Don’t forget to subscribe for more book industry insights, fantasy book content, and updates on my own publishing journey.

title: The Brutal Truth About Getting a Literary Agent (& How to Actually Do It)
